Issue.creator: greg.haskins
Issue.summary: Remove implicit 'behave' from the "make all" target
Issue.description: To my knowledge, the behave tests still do not work in all circumstances and they are generally sensitive to the host environment's prerequisites. Therefore, lets remove behave as an implicit target. Note that the explicit targets e.g. "make behave" will continue to function, and we can always add it back to 'all' when it makes sense to do so.
